name: Worm (Sasha Drojjin)
description:
Release Date: July 2008

Realization of the famous game Worm (other names for the game are Python, Snake). The worm crawls to a fun music and eats apples from which it grows. Also, from eating apples, he increases the speed of movement. The task is to eat all the apples and not crash into the stone or into yourself.

There is a level editor in which you can change existing stages and create new ones.
